list.name: SHOT-IN-THE-ARM
list.description: Byron uses one of his shots to heal himself x per second for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Byron uses one of his shots to heal himself x per second for x seconds.

list.name: BOOSTER-SHOTS
list.description: Byron's next attack shoots x darts instead of one, each dealing <ccc0000>x% less damage and <ccc0000>x% less healing.
list.descriptionHtml: Byron's next attack shoots x darts instead of one, each dealing x% less damage and x% less healing.
